actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend sections 2734a(a) and 2734b(a) of title 10, United States Code, to provide for settlement, of certain claims incident to the noncombat activities of the armed forces, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the settlement by the Secretary of Defense or the Secretary of the Treasury, under international agreements, of claims incident to the noncombat activities of the Armed Forces. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 2734a(a), 2734b(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend sections 2734a(a) and 2734b(a) of title 10, United States Code, to provide for settlement, of certain claims incident to the noncombat activities of the armed forces, and for other purposes.
